channel.title: Creating a ranged weapon?
channel.description:
can someone please tell me how i can create a ranged weapon that can fire from a distance.
Example: Make the fixed device be able to fire from far away instead of close.
Thank You [br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 03:37:24 PM[/size][hr]anyone please?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 04:08:35 PM[/size][hr]maybe someone cantell me where i can find the rnged void and i can add the item id to it.
Anyone know???
